price: 102. Maaalinta buunka la afuufi20 (afuufka labaad), oo aan isu soo kulmin denbiila- yaasha Maalintaa iyagoo indho cawlan21.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا
footnotes:
20. Afuufka labaad ee Buunka, waana afuufka dadka ay ka soo bixi doonaan qubuurahooda iyagoo nool. 
21. Cabsi darteed, ama macnaha waa iyagoo indha la’ waxba aan arkayn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri wanaḥshuru al-muj'rimīna yawma-idhin zur'qan
